biotools.summary:
a computational approach for large-scale identification of polymorphic microsatellites based on comparative transcriptome analysis.

This software can automatically enrich polymorphic SSRs with transcripts.

You just need to select all of your fasta files from Trinity and run this software.

bioschemas.name: SSREnricher
